meta.description: Discover Terratech's innovative polymer injection process for concrete stabilization and infrastructure repair. Learn how we assess, plan, and execute projects with precision and efficiency.

section.description: Fast, precise, and engineered for lasting stability.

injection.subtitle:
A straightforward process for identifying subsurface issues 
and stabilizing infrastructure from below.

section.title: Our Process
section.description: We rapidly assess structural issues using state of the art early detection methods. We deploy advanced 3D scanning, provide substantive analysis, and conduct in depth reporting.

tabs.title: The Problem
tabs.content: Across the country, aging infrastructure faces hidden threats: leaking stormwater systems, unstable soils, settling concrete, and sinkholes that appear without warning. Traditional repairs mean excavation and downtime, but Terratech delivers engineered polymer injection solutions that restore strength faster, cleaner, and with less disruption. Our client focused approach brings custom solutions for every unique job site.

sections.title: Seeing Beneath the Surface
sections.lead: 3D scanning and detection tools map voids, instability, and weak strata.
sections.text: Using advanced scanning technologies, we identify subsurface anomalies that compromise stability—without excavation or disruption.

sections.title: Intelligent Subsurface Targeting
sections.text: Instead of over-engineered reports, we turn raw data into visible, smart-mapped action plans to pinpoint exactly where injection is needed, what volume is required, and how results are  measured.

sections.title: Minimal Impact, Maximum Results
sections.lead:
Small-diameter drill points 
access treatment zones with surgical accuracy.
sections.text: We eliminate the need for heavy equipment by drilling precise, unobtrusive injection holes. The result is minimal disruption and a fast, no excavation solution.

sections.title: Strength Where It Matters Most
sections.lead: High-density polymer expands underground, compacting and stabilizing soil.
sections.text: Injected at precise depths and pressures, our engineered polymers displace voids, restore load paths, and reinforce weak strata. Controlled expansion allows us to lift, level, or stabilize structures depending on project needs.

sections.title: Live Data, Informed Adjustments
sections.lead: Sensors track flow, pressure, and displacement as injections occur.
sections.text: Our monitoring system provides immediate feedback, allowing on-the-fly adjustments that guarantee accuracy and true, long-term solutions.

sections.title: Immediate Results & Proof You Can Act On

blocks.title: Immediate Results
blocks.text: Polymer cures in minutes, restoring load-bearing strength so roads and facilities reopen with minimal downtime.

blocks.title: Proof You Can Act On
blocks.text: Concise reports combine test data and injection logs into clear, defensible documentation—without the clutter of traditional engineering reports.
